abilities.desc: At the start of your turn, you gain 1 Iron token.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

abilities.desc: You may spend your Iron Tokens as if they were Power tokens or Speed tokens.

actions.name: High Efficiency
actions.desc:
Choose two: You heal 1; -or- you gain 1 Iron token; -or- you gain 1 Power token; -or- you gain 1 Speed token; -or- you deal 1 damage to an enemy within range.
4+: Choose all five instead.
8+: Replace all 1â€™s in High Efficiency with 2â€™s.
